loc: FOR PERM NOTAMS PLS REFER PERM NOTAM BULLETIN PUBLISHED ON 01 AND 16 DAY OF EVERY MONTH. THIS BULLETIN CONTAINS:
1. INFORMATION EFFECTIVE ON THE DATE MENTIONED ABOVE.
2. ADVANCE INFORMATION THAT WILL BECOME EFFECTIVE WITHIN NEXT 24 HOURS.
3. NOTAMS ON TAXIWAY AND APRON ARE NOT INCLUDED.
4. ANY CHANGES IN PERM NOTAM DURING THE PERIOD BETWEEN 01 TO 15 AND 16 TO END OF THE MONTH
